reviews.title: WHERE\'S MY COINS!!!!!
reviews.comment: Like the game.... But I bought coins and didnt get them. I want my coins or my money back. I don\'t understand how u can rip people  off like this. Pure bullshit
reviews.author: M Brown

reviews.title: Bad
reviews.comment: WTF!! Everytime when I open the game, It forces close! Not even able to open and play the game as only the black screen appears. Don\'t download this game. It\'s just an option to give it 1 star otherwise it doesn\'t even deserves this!
reviews.author: Karan Chouhan

reviews.comment: Great , JUST SO AMAZING .\nThis is cool , love it good for my karate class xD
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: This game is totally addicting and Awesome :) I got a headache cuz i played it for hours! XD  It\'s so challenging and Fun! :] Good Job Com2us! Keep it up! :)
reviews.author: sharon tan

reviews.title: Looks cool right?
reviews.comment: Total bull SHIET! Can\'t get passed the 2nd mission without buying coins for the game. I expected this but not on the 2nd mission. Don\'t buy unless you like to spend money. \302\254. \302\254
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Force Closes
reviews.comment: I thouht it would ve a nice game and i really wanted to play it but after loading a bit it force closes. :-( please fix this and i will give 5 stars.           -Galaxy y duos lite
reviews.author: ayush aswal

reviews.title: Didnt get cash item
reviews.comment: The game is actually fun to play. But the only thing i hate is when i buy the cash item it didnt appear. Please fix it.
reviews.author: ainul shafeeq

reviews.title: It\'s fun
reviews.comment: It is a good game, and you dont need to spend money on the game by the 2nd mission like people say. It is hard but not im possible kids who cant beat tne secind mission shouldnt play games with a challenge
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs improvement
reviews.comment: The gameplay is nice but you can\'t level up since the creatures your about to kill fall and u never gain exp. And you can\'t go back stages to try and boost up your level.
reviews.author: Amir R

reviews.title: Fun for a minute
reviews.comment: It sucks they gang up and fall off a cliff and run away.  the bosses are too big in health for it to be fun  It is a terrible game that barely deserves a star uninstall asap
reviews.author: daniel guerra

reviews.title: Will you ever fix this bug?
reviews.comment: I am waiting for 5 months for you to fix the bug where when i put the game it force closes it .will you ever fix this or are you trolling us?
reviews.author: Philip Effraim

reviews.title: In my opinion,
reviews.comment: One of the best games out there, period.  I love this game; graphics, cute characters...all dat stuff. I say, you should just keep playing and leveling up. I got to level 37 without buying coins, and I bet you can do it too. Its just a challenging game! ;) Well done Com2us! You\'ve earned my five stars.
reviews.author: doodle kirby

reviews.title: Doesnt work
reviews.comment: Every time I tried to open it up, it just me a black screen and said,\"unfortunately, this app is unable to run.\".
reviews.author: Evan Salas

reviews.title: Retarted
reviews.comment: This game sucks won\'t let me play if u have the same phone like me don\'t install takes up to much memory and it keeps force closing if I could id give it a 0 or a -5 suck\305\237sssssssssssssssssssss
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Its soo cool just need to improved getting coins please
reviews.author: John Lloyd Yadao

reviews.title: Review ftw!
reviews.comment: Great game, although it can be difficul at first. My only concern is that it lacks the \"move to sd card\" option, which is a shame for such a good game.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Woah now.
reviews.comment: Okay. Woah. Everyone chill out. Second level isnt THAT hard. I didnt beat it the first time so I figured, \"this game has stats, simply upgrade\". I did so and beat it with the exception of minuses steaight whacking and hacking with no kills. And most importantly, COMUS2 or whatever, I spent my dollar, and now I want my coins. I will send out a few messages and contact support, but if I dont get my worth, I will campaign for removal. Or a smear campaign. Oh and clearly based off of Maplestory. I love it.
reviews.author: Daquan Lewis

reviews.title: Warning...
reviews.comment: The game seems to be fun but do not purchase the additional coins they offer to power up. I did it few times and they took my cash but never updated my game with additional coins...its only $1.00 every transaction but still I got ripped...trying to get my money back...
reviews.author: scott yom

reviews.title: Good to pass time
reviews.comment: It\'s a fun game, it\'s a bit sloppy, though. How it\'s formatted could have been a bit smoother. And the grammar is pretty bad. Other than that, the idea is good.
reviews.author: Michael Lang

reviews.title: STUPID.
reviews.comment: it doesnt play.. and it takes up huge space in phone memory, please add \"move to sdcard\" option..  if u can fix, ill change it to 5 stars!
reviews.author: A Google User
